p: Total phenolic content (TPC) in CCLE was evaluated using a Folin-Ciocalteu colorimetric assay described by Do et al., with slight modification [ 20]. The sample was dissolved in 70% ethanol solution; 80 μL of the sample was added to 800 μL Folin-Ciocalteu solution (10-fold diluted) in a glass tube, then added 800 μL Na 2CO 3 (7.5%) and 320 μL distilled water, mixed thoroughly, and left standing for 30 minutes at room temperature in dark condition. The absorbance of the mixture was measured at 760 nm using a UV-VIS spectrophotometer V-7200 model (Jasco, Tokyo, Japan). TPC was expressed as milligram gallic acid equivalent per gram of CCLE (mg GAE/gE).
